keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICA AND NEAR EAST AREAS

headline.main: RIBBENTROP REBUKE; Polish Cirles in France See Sign of His Failure With Pope

lead_paragraph: PARIS, April 1--The German Government's refusal to permit the Papal Nuncio to Berlin, Mgr. Cesare Orsenigo, to investigate on the spot the situation of the clergy and the Catholic population in occupied Poland is taken in Polish ecclesiastical and political circles here as another evidence of the failure of Joachim von Ribbentrop's mission to improve relations with the Holy See.
